April 1968
I have also discussed this problem by telephone on April 5 with
Dr. Robert T. HlUiard of the FCC's Educational Broadcasting Eranch.
About all I got from him was sympathy.
What can be done to combat this altitude on the part of the FCC
and to free these educational FM reservations fur new stations? I
would personally be willing to help you in any way possible.
Sincerely,
Cecil S, Bidiaek
